subject: College Athletics
Probation and Parole
lead_paragraph: The father of Oklahoma’s star running back, Adrian Peterson, will not be able to attend the game between the No. 14 Sooners and No. 7 Texas in Dallas.
snippet: The father of Oklahoma’s star running back, Adrian Peterson, will not be able to attend the game between the No. 14 Sooners and No. 7 Texas in Dallas.
